about_the_game:
Total Control is a text based NSFW god complex game. In this game you will have supernatural powers combined with RPG elements that will give you Total Control over the world.

You are an all powerful demon, who does what he wants, when he wants. You have multiple spells, characters and locations to play with. The goal of this game is to make you feel like a god! Or... well a demon.

This game is completely text based. You can type your commands or use numbers as shortcuts.

How to play:

The game can be played by either typing in the words you see (e.g. "Talk", "Sex", "Teleport") or you can just type the numbers that are next to the words.


This game may contain:

Gay/Yaoi
Lesbian/Yuri
Incest
Non-consensual sex
Domination
Submission

Somethings that are currently missing but are planned or in development are:

Story
Level Progression
Combat (*Implemented*)
Romance options

SPELLS

Fireball | Kill anyone with a large ball of fire
Make horny | To make a character so horny they will sleep with anyone
Sleep | Make a character fall asleep immediately
Give Energy | Give someone full energy
Teleport | Teleport to any location in the world
Get Information | Get all information about a character (i.e. Name, age, lust, etc)
Possess | Take over another character and play as them
Wait | Jump forward in time X minutes

And many more spells to add later in development to further your Total Control

CHARACTERS

You | Default name: "MC"
Ella | MCs mother
Gerold | MCs father
Sarna | MCs sister
Oliver | MCs brother
Bella | Works at the Adventurers guild
Princess Fiora | Princess of the kingdom
King John | King of the kingdom
Queen Audrey | Queen of the kingdom
Unnamed Female | Human maid working in the castle
Unnamed Female | Elf maid working in the castle
Unnamed Female | Catgirl maid working in the castle
Melissa | Neighbour
Arthur | Neighbours son
And many more characters to add later in development

LOCATIONS

MCs house
Adventurers Guild | A place to get quests and gain exp
Castle | Where the rulers of the kingdom live
Many areas around town, such as: Town Centre, Adventurers Guild, Market.
And many more places in the kingdom to be added as development goes on
